welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oakville, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our picturesque town known for its beautiful waterfront, vibrant arts scene, and historic downtown. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Oakville has to offer.

restaurants.name: Roma Ristorante
restaurants.description: Roma Ristorante is a italian restaurant located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Ro's Pizza
restaurants.description: Ro's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Martino's Pizzaria
restaurants.description: Martino's Pizzaria is a pizzeria located in Oakville.

restaurants.name: Ordinary Joe's
restaurants.description: Ordinary Joe's is a american restaurant located in Watertown.

restaurants.name: Cavallo's Italian Specialty Shoppe
restaurants.description: Cavallo's Italian Specialty Shoppe is a deli located in Watertown.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport, also known as Billy Bishop Airport, is a modern and efficient terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Marina Terminal
terminals.description: The marina terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport offers private and charter flights, as well as access to the airport's water shuttle service.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal and is free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John C. Munroe Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at John C. Munroe Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
